channel.title: Comments on: Getting started with LESS

item.title: By: Oliver Caldwell

item.description: Sure, what's the error you're getting?

item.title: By: Omar
item.dc:creator: Omar
item.description: Can you help me I am trying to do the `sudo npm install less` but I am getting an error
item.content:encoded: Can you help me I am trying to do the sudo npm install less but I am getting an error

item.title: By: stopsatgreen
item.dc:creator: stopsatgreen
item.description: Thanks, this was really useful for me as I get to grips with Node & Less.
item.content:encoded: Thanks, this was really useful for me as I get to grips with Node & Less.

item.title: By: Web Development UK
item.dc:creator: Web Development UK
item.description: Hi, Thanks for sharing us this very informative and well written blog post.I like this type of information because you always can learn some interesting new knowledge and at the same time revive the knowledge you already know I love every bit of it especially the points that you expressed. And I would love to come back in a regular basis so post more of the subject!!! <a href="http://www.webdevelopmentinlondon.co.uk/" rel="nofollow">Web Development UK </a> David
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
Thanks for sharing us this very informative and well written blog post.I like this type of information because you always can learn some interesting new knowledge and at the same time revive the knowledge you already know I love every bit of it especially the points that you expressed. And I would love to come back in a regular basis so post more of the subject!!!
 Web Development UK
David
